text: lemon curd is one of my all-time
favorite things and here in the test
kitchens we get a lot of questions about
the best way to make it the real
tried-and-true foolproof method is
dumping all of the ingredients into one
pot this is a one pot lemon curd and I'm
gonna show you how to do it one cup of
granulated sugar one tablespoon of
freshly grated lemon zest my pan is off
the heat no heat just yet
eight egg yolks so you just want to mix
this up in the pot and then add 2/3 of a
cup of freshly squeezed lemon juice 1/4
teaspoon of salt and the last ingredient
is the butter and typically with lemon
curds you add this in at the end off the
heat but we're putting it all into one
pot we're making it easier we're making
it faster turn the heat on medium heat
and whisk until the butter is melted and
the mixture is thick enough to coat the
back of a spoon so the curd is nice and
thick and let me show you what that
means you dip the spoon in you should be
able to draw it your finger down the
back of the spoon and it should leave a
trail just like this so it's nice and
ready so I'm gonna strain it through a
fine mesh sieve and this pulls out any
egg yolk that it may be has been
overcooked and so this goes into the
refrigerator now to chill for a few
hours until it's nice and firm to
prevent a skin from forming place
plastic wrap directly on the top of the
curd and then into the refrigerator for
about 3 6 hours until it's nice and firm
heal off the plastic wrap now you can
make this with any type of citrus you
can make it with orange you can make it
with lime you could even do grapefruit
you can even do raspberries which is
really colorful and also really
delicious look how thick it gets so
wonderful and I'm just going to fill
some tarts here
this would be perfectly delicious in
between layers of yellow butter cake or
served alongside some scones any place
you would use jam you could use lemon
curd so you could top this with a
delicious Swiss meringue
you could top it with whipped cream
maybe some berries so there you have it
a no-fuss one pot lemon curd that's as
delicious as can be and if you haven't
made lemon curd before this is the
recipe for you hey guys thanks for
watching do you have a kitchen conundrum
that you need solved well if you do
write in the comment section below and
as always click Subscribe
